Analyzed.name: Analyzed
Analyzed.description: This card cannot be chosen for any further <c=action>analysis</c>.

Accelerated.name: Accelerated
Accelerated.description: This card costs 1 less <c=energy>energy</c>, to a minimum of 1.

SmartShield.name: Smart Shield
SmartShield.description: Gain up to {{Amount}} <c=status>shield</c>, converting any remaining to <c=status>temp shield</c>.

Analyze.name: Analyze
Analyze.description: Choose a non-<c=cardtrait>analyzed</c>, non-<c=cardtrait>temp</c> card in hand. It gains <c=cardtrait>Analyzed</c> until end of combat.

Deanalyze.name: De-analyze
Deanalyze.description: Choose an <c=cardtrait>analyzed</c> card in hand. It loses <c=cardtrait>Analyzed</c> until end of combat.

SelfAnalyze.name: Self-Analyze
SelfAnalyze.description: This card gains <c=cardtrait>Analyzed</c> until end of combat.

AnalyzeOrSelfAnalyze.name: (Self-)Analyze
AnalyzeOrSelfAnalyze.description: This card gains <c=cardtrait>Analyzed</c> until end of combat. If it was already <c=cardtrait>Analyzed</c>, <c=action>Analyze</c> a different card.

OnAnalyze.name: On Analyze
OnAnalyze.description: This action only triggers when this card gains <c=cardtrait>Analyzed</c>.

Analyzable.stateful: <c=action>X</c> = All other analyzable cards in hand (<c=boldPink>{{Count}}</c>).
Analyzable.stateless: <c=action>X</c> = All other analyzable cards in hand.

AnalyzedInHand.stateful: <c=action>X</c> = All other analyzed cards in hand (<c=boldPink>{{Count}}</c>).
AnalyzedInHand.stateless: <c=action>X</c> = All other analyzed cards in hand.

SmartShieldDrone.name: Smart Shield Drone
SmartShieldDrone.description: Beams 1 <c=status>smart shield</c> at its target once per turn.

Entanglement.name: Entanglement
Entanglement.description: Whenever this ship moves, the opposing ship moves the same distance in the other direction. <c=downside>Decreases by 1 each turn.</c>

Gadget.name: Gadget Progress
Gadget.description: After combat ends, if you have 15 or more of it, <c=downside>lose all of it</c> and gain 1 of 2 common artifacts. <c=textBold>Persists between combats.</c>

Relativity.name: Relativity
Relativity.description: Lets you move left or right with <c=boldPink>{{MoveLeft}}</c> / <c=boldPink>{{MoveRight}}</c>, or move all <c=midrow>midrow objects</c> left or right with <c=boldPink>{{ShiftLeft}}</c> / <c=boldPink>{{ShiftRight}}</c>, or move the enemy left or right. Costs 1 relativity per move. Maximum 3.

RelativityTheory.name: RELATIVITY THEORY
RelativityTheory.description: On your first turn, convert all <c=status>evade</c> and <c=status>droneshift</c> into <c=status>relativity</c>.

description.None: <c=action>Analyze</c> a card. It gains <c=cardtrait>Accelerated</c> for the rest of combat.
description.A: <c=action>Analyze</c> a card. It gains <c=cardtrait>Accelerated</c> for the rest of combat.

B.normal: <c=action>Analyze</c> a card. <c=cardtrait>Discount</c> it.<c=5f5f5f> / Un-analyze a card and make it expensive.</c>
B.flipped: <c=5f5f5f>Analyze a card. Discount it. / </c><c=action>Un-analyze</c> a card and make it <c=cardtrait>expensive</c>.

None.stateful: <c=action>X</c> = all other analyzed hand cards. Gain X (<c=boldPink>{{Amount}}</c>) <c=status>Gadget Progress</c>.
None.stateless: <c=action>X</c> = all other analyzed hand cards. Gain X <c=status>Gadget Progress</c>.

A.stateful: <c=action>X</c> = all other analyzed hand cards. Gain X (<c=boldPink>{{Amount}}</c>) <c=status>Gadget Progress</c>.
A.stateless: <c=action>X</c> = all other analyzed hand cards. Gain X <c=status>Gadget Progress</c>.

B.stateful: Gain 2 <c=status>Gadget Progress</c>. <c=action>X</c> = times played this combat. <c=downside>Receive 2X (<c=boldPink>{{Damage}}</c>) damage.</c>
B.stateless: Gain 2 <c=status>Gadget Progress</c>. <c=action>X</c> = times played this combat. <c=downside>Receive 2X damage.</c>

description.None: <c=action>Analyze</c> a card that does not <c=cardtrait>exhaust</c>. Play it for free.
description.A: <c=action>Analyze</c> a card. Play it for free.
description.B: Choose a card in your hand. Play it for free.

description.None: <c=action>Analyze</c> a card. Make a <c=cardtrait>temp</c> copy of it.
description.A: Choose an <c=cardtrait>analyzable</c> card in hand. Make a <c=cardtrait>temp</c> copy of it.
description.B: <c=action>Analyze</c> a card. Make 4 <c=cardtrait>temp</c> copies of it. <c=downside>Lose 1 hull.</c>

None.stateful: <c=action>X</c> = all other analyzable hand cards. <c=action>Analyze</c> them. Shoot for 2X (<c=boldPink>{{Damage}}</c>).
None.stateless: <c=action>X</c> = all other analyzable hand cards. <c=action>Analyze</c> them. Shoot for 2X.

A.stateful: <c=action>X</c> = all other analyzable hand cards. <c=action>Analyze</c> them. Shoot for 2X (<c=boldPink>{{Damage}}</c>).
A.stateless: <c=action>X</c> = all other analyzable hand cards. <c=action>Analyze</c> them. Shoot for 2X.

B.stateful: <c=action>X</c> = all other analyzable hand cards. <c=action>Analyze</c> them. Shoot for 3X (<c=boldPink>{{Damage}}</c>).
B.stateless: <c=action>X</c> = all other analyzable hand cards. <c=action>Analyze</c> them. Shoot for 3X.

Relativity.name: Relativity
Relativity.description: Move <c=midrow>midrow</c> and both ships by different amounts each in 0-2. Gain 2 <c=status>relativity</c>.

description.None: <c=action>Analyze</c> a card. Draw cards equal to its cost, +2.
description.A: <c=action>Analyze</c> a card. Draw cards equal to its cost, +3.
description.B: <c=action>Analyze</c> a random card. Draw cards equal to its cost, +1.
